Line 352:  DefineSection("ContentScript", () => {
Line 353:  
Line 354:  WriteLiteral("\r\n    <script src=\"/Content/Vendors/formvalidation/formValidation.js\"></script>\r\n" +
Line 355:  "    <script src=\"/Content/Vendors/formvalidation/framework/bootstrap4.js\"></scri" +
Line 356:  "pt>\r\n    <script src=\"/Content/Vendors/formvalidation/language/vi_VN.js\"></scrip" +
Line 357:  "t>\r\n    <script src=\"/Content/js/re_issue_invoice.js\"></script>\r\n    <script src" +
Line 358:  "=\"/Content/Vendors/moment/min/moment.min.js\"></script>\r\n    <script src=\"/Conten" +
Line 359:  "t/Vendors/bootstrap-datetimepicker/build/js/bootstrap-datetimepicker.min.js\"></s" +
Line 360:  "cript>\r\n    <script type=\"text/javascript\">\r\n        $(document).ready(function " +
Line 361:  "() {\r\n            //$(\'.date\').datepicker\r\n            //    ({\r\n            // " +
Line 362:  "       dateFormat: \'dd/mm/yy\',\r\n            //        showStatus: true,\r\n       " +
Line 363:  "     //        showWeeks: true,\r\n            //        highlightWeek: true\r\n\r\n  " +
Line 364:  "          //    });\r\n\r\n            //$(\'.issue-form\').parsley().validate();\r\n   " +
Line 365:  "     });\r\n        function selectTemplate() {\r\n            var today = new Date(" +
Line 366:  ");\r\n            var year = today.getYear() + \'\';\r\n\r\n            var stateId = $(" +
Line 367:  "\'#TemplateId\').val();\r\n            $(\'#No\').val(stateId + \'0/\');\r\n            $(" +
Line 368:  "\'#SerialInvoice\').val(\'AA/\' + year.substring(1, 3) + \'E\');\r\n        }\r\n\r\n       " +
Line 369:  " function onchangeevent() {\r\n\r\n            var x = Number($(\'#startNumber\').val(" +
Line 370:  "));\r\n            var y = Number($(\'#endNumber\').val());\r\n            var z = (y " +
Line 371:  "- x) + 1;\r\n            if (z >= 0) {\r\n                $(\'#quantity\').val(z);\r\n  " +
Line 372:  "          } else {\r\n                alert(\"Đến số không được nhỏ hơn từ số!\");\r\n" +
Line 373:  "                $(\'#endNumber\').focus();\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    </script" +
Line 374:  ">");
Line 375:  
Line 376:  
Line 377:  });
Line 378:  
Line 379:  WriteLiteral("\r\n");
Line 380:  
Line 381:  
Line 382:          }
Line 383:      }
Line 384:  }
